answers.answer: I failed the first by 7 points. Passed the 3 hour test though.  It's common to pass the 1 hour test. I wouldn't worry.
My doctor said my levels were really high, I'm kinda worried about it

Had the same thing happen. Found out i just didnt well the day before and my blood sugars were high from what I ate before my test. Just make sure your making good choices when you are eating.  I was eating candy and sweets! Not good! But i passed my 3 hour test a week after
With my first I failed the 1 hour my sugar was elevated by 30 points. And I had to do the 3 hour and passed it with no problem.
Alright thanks ladies, I hope I pass

question: Well, just found out I failed my 1hr glucose test and I probably have diabetes.. I'm nervous for the 3hr test. Any inputs momma's?
title: failed the test
